creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mrs Justin Dart
description: cluster of buildings in a mountain valley with waterfall at center R; thatched roofs, lightly tinted brown; pine trees and blossoming trees in front of buildings; light blue mountain in background; towering rock face at R with small walking path below; rolling mountain bluffs with pine trees rise towards UL; narrow walking path leads to another cluster of buildings with white walls and planked, pitched roofs; another waterfall at far L; inscription at center with two small red stamps; red relief stamp LRC; mounted to jet black board
title: Amid the Mountains
